About JA by Redlii

What is Redlii

Redlii is an idea about liberation, accepting change, helping others, and understanding our own self.

Is it Redlii or Redlli

Both Redlii and Redlli are acceptable. It's not about how you spell it or read it, it's about how you see it.

What is JA?

JA is very small at the moment, but we wish to be one of the leading organizations developing open-source apps that will make life easier and fun games that are not goal-oriented but for people to enjoy. With this small mission, JA was formed.

How You Can Contribute to JA by Redlii

  • Donate: If you have money and like using our stuff or find it interesting, give us money. We need it.
  • Share Your Ideas: If you have any cool ideas, feel free to reach out to us and become part of JA.
  • Code: In your free time, fix bugs and contribute to open source.
  • Spread the Word: Use open source instead of money-hungry stuff and share some of our cool stuff.

--- A Redlli Project ---
